title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Deal of the day: Fly business class to Dublin for just 45K miles during peak season
items.description: Fly to Dublin in comfort this fall from several major U.S. cities starting at just 45,000 miles. Here's what to know and how to book.

items.title: Manhattan just got its first-ever Hyatt Regency
items.description: Manhattan just got its first-ever Hyatt Regency, located right in Times Square. Here's what we know.

items.title: Bank of America Premium Rewards Elite credit card review: A formidable contender â€” with a caveat
items.description: The Bank of America Premium Rewards Elite credit card competes with premium cards thanks to its statement credits, lounge access and hefty annual fee.

items.title: American joins 'grab-and-go' rush, will open new lounge concept in Charlotte
items.description: American Airlines is debuting an all-new grab-and-go lounge concept set to open later this summer at its Charlotte hub.

items.title: A guide to Lyft benefits as a Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholder
items.description: A monthly $10 credit on Lyft rides per month and 5 points per dollar for Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders. Here's what you need to know.
